text: Alvin Journeyman (1995) is an alternate history and fantasy book that was written by Orson Scott Card. It is the fourth book in Card's The Tales of Alvin Maker series and is about Alvin Miller, the seventh son of a seventh son, which gives him magical powers. ==Other websites== * About the novel Alvin Journeyman from Card's website Category:1995 books Category:The Tales of Alvin Maker
title: Alvin Journeyman
